name: Imagine: Gymnast
overview: Train in all types of gymnastic activities, such as the uneven bars, balance beam, and trampoline in Imagine Gymnast. Learn gymnastics under the instruction of Olympic Gold Medalist Shannon Miller Play through 12 chapters on your way to the World Championship Finals Compete in Vault, Balance Beam, Uneven Bars, Floor, and Rhythmic Gymnastics events Customize your look, routine and team Use the DSi camera to take a picture and use it to customize your own leotard!
